          <identifier>

          <title>
            <string language="en">Air pressure</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Luftdruck</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Pression atmosphérique</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Pressão de ar</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Pressione d'aria</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Πίεση αέρα</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Presión de aire</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows that the atmospheric pressure decreases at higher altitudes. This is because the atmosphere gets thinner.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">atmosphere</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">atmospheric pressure</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">pascal</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">sea level</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt, daß der atmosphärische 
Druck an den größeren Höhen sich verringert. Dieses ist, weil
die Atmosphäre Verdünner erhält.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration prouve que la pression 
atmosphérique diminue à des altitudes plus élevées. C'est 
parce que l'atmosphère obtient le diluant.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra que a pressão 
atmosférica diminui em umas alturas mais elevadas. Isto é 
porque a atmosfera começa o diluidor.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione indica che la pressione 
atmosferica diminuisce alle più alte altezze. Ciò è perché 
l'atmosfera ottiene il diluente.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση δείχνει ότι η ατμοσφαιρική πίεση 
μειώνεται στα υψηλότερα ύψη. Αυτό είναι επειδή η 
ατμόσφαιρα παίρνει λεπτύτερη.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra que la presión 
atmosférica disminuye en altitudes más altas. Esto es porque 
la atmósfera consigue el deluente.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Atmosphäre</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">atmosphärischer Druck</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Pascal</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Meeresspiegel</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">l'atmosphère</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">pression atmosphérique</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Pascal</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">niveau de la mer</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
